thread.title: Readers Weigh In on Picking Up Loose Change

author: wsjcom
title: Readers Weigh In on Picking Up Loose Change
text:
In an essay in the Wealth Management report in February, Wall Street Journal editor Brian Hershberg wrote of his 20-year quest picking up most of the loose change he came across on the ground. What began as a vague idea for supplemental cash as he was entering his final semester in college turned into a lesson on value, patience and time.
To date, Brian has found $973.45.
But...
